mapper.select: SELECT d.ID AS DASHBOARD_ID, d.NAME AS DASHBOARD_NAME, d.ROW, d.COLUMN, l.ID AS DASHBOARD_LAYOUT_ID, l.X, l.Y, l.W, l.H, l.CHART_ID, c.TEST AS CHART_TEST FROM DASHBOARD d INNER JOIN DASHBOARD_LAYOUT l ON d.ID = l.DASHBOARD_ID INNER JOIN CHART c ON l.CHART_ID = c.ID WHERE d.ID = #{dashboardId}
